function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher levels of stress and PTSD associated with gender, age, income, and education","Impact":"Increased risk of developing PTSD and stress-related symptoms","Mitigation":"Promote access to mental health resources, provide support for vulnerable groups, and raise awareness about risk factors","Technologies":"Mental health apps, teletherapy platforms, and community support networks","People":"Women, young people, unemployed individuals, those with lower education and income, individuals with previous psychiatric illness","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, community support groups"},{"Description":"Pandemic-related factors contributing to stress and PTSD","Impact":"Increased risk of anxiety, depression, and PTSD during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information, promote mental health awareness, and offer support for individuals affected by pandemic-related stress","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health hotlines, and online mental health resources","People":"General population during pandemic, individuals with concern about COVID-19, those affected by social distancing","Owner":"Public health organizations, mental health professionals, community leaders"}]}
